name: 0's & X's
description: This is the first version of  0's & X's,  which is text only, though future updates will have more graphics and be Cheeeky Bloks styled. Remember that even if you buy it now, you will have access to all future updates. Instructions are included in the game. This game has difficulty ratings 1-100 (easy to impossible) and 1 or 2 player modes. BEWARE: IMPOSSIBLE IS IMPOSSIBLE!!!!!!
